Name: LAST CHICK - 最後のひよこ
About the game: The second of low-price series of KimidoriSoft! 'LAST CHICK - 最後のひよこ' Appears! For video creators and streamers KIMIDORI SOFT permits monetization through partner programs using KIMIDORI SOFT games. An action game depicting the majestic daily lives of chickens and their families living in a world where humanity has become a zombie. Overcome the crisis in three modes using two egg techniques developed by the parent chicken. Three game modes: Rescue mode Innocent chicks love adventure. The trouble is that the chicks have lost their way into the house where the zombies wander. The objective is to operate the parent chicken and rescue as many chicks from the house as possible within the time limit, put them on the cart and escape. Escape mode A chicken family looking for food in town. When you notice, there are many zombies around! The goal is to return to the cart as soon as possible while keeping the chicks from being eaten by zombies. Defense mode Part 2 of the chicken family looking for food in town. When you notice, there are many zombies around again! But the chicks are hungry and can't move. The aim is to keep the chicks as long as possible with the eggs of the parent chicken. Features: Physics-based zombies and eggs: Zombies and eggs work with physics simulations and fall and fly with realistic movements. Let's enjoy watching. Ranking: There are rankings that compete in each of the three modes. Compete with players around the world.
